announcements.title: Slime Impact 2D!
body: - Scientist buffs (damage speed, movement speed increase)
- Fixed black screen bug after teleporting to Nod-Krai
- Hardcore Mode and Insane Mode badges
- Ifa now follows the player if too far
- Fixed Anemo ability not being granted from Red Riot
- Changed prefab size of Ghost Bomb
- Slime King, Scientist and Lucifer now heal on player death

announcements.title: Momentum Bound
body: Have you ever been trapped in your own head? Tortured by the misdeeds of your past? Find out if you can escape in Momentum Bound
